document.full_text: treasury secretary timothy geithner went on the offensive one day after standard & poor's threatened to downgrade its top-tier rating on u.s. government debt, saying there was "no risk" of a loss of the coveted rating.
document.title: geithner says "no risk" u.s. will lose aaa rating
lines_and_colors: treasury secretary timothy geithner went on the offensive one day after standard & poor's threatened to downgrade its top-tier rating on u.s. government debt, saying there was "no risk" of a loss of the coveted rating.
